name: Insane Boxing
description:
P1 Controls = ←↕→ ,  X, Z           P2 Controls = ESDF ,  Q, W

Left and right punches are controlled by X, Z  /  Q, W.

Block with up and down directional keys.

Combine punches with directional keys for a variety of different punches (jabs, uppercuts, body blows)

The colors aren't exact CGA values,  but they are as close as the Pico-8 console will allow.  Enjoy!
